title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson through the eyes of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers that reality as he knows it doesn't exist and finds himself at war with the machines.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.

title: City of God
description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Life Is Beautiful
description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses humor to protect his son.

title: Spirited Away
description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods and witches.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover escape the Nazis.

title: Seven Samurai
description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

title: Singin' in the Rain
description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound films.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like.

title: Sunset Blvd.
description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: The Wizard of Oz
description: Dorothy and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from Kansas to a magical land of Oz.

title: Citizen Kane
description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final word.

title: Psycho
description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles money from her employer's client and encounters a young motel proprietor.

title: Vertigo
description: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a woman.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united Arab tribes during World War I.

title: Apocalypse Now
description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel.

title: Taxi Driver
description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a police informant play cat and mouse with each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

title: WALL-E
description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey.

title: The Lives of Others
description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police becomes increasingly absorbed by the lives of a writer and his lover.

title: North by Northwest
description: A New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

title: Aliens
description: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel, Ellen Ripley is rescued.

title: American Beauty
description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's friend.

title: Dr. Strangelove
description: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians try to stop.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: Paths of Glory
description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

title: Rear Window
description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them committed murder.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

title: M
description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment.

title: Double Indemnity
description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge.

title: The Elephant Man
description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak.

title: Amadeus
description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri.

title: Das Boot
description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

title: Bicycle Thieves
description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work.

title: Raging Bull
description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper led him to the top in the ring.

title: The Third Man
description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating his friend Harry Lime.

title: Singin' in the Rain
description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound films.

title: The Gold Rush
description: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune.

title: L.A. Confidential
description: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Chinatown
description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit and murder.

title: Metropolis
description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the mastermind falls in love.

title: Modern Times
description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: The Prestige
description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate stage illusion.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son John Connor.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.

title: The Pianist
description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Intouchables
description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Whiplash
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a police informant play cat and mouse with each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

title: Once Upon a Time in the West
description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: A teenage boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: Cinema Paradiso
description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village.

title: The Great Dictator
description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: Requiem for a Dream
description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with HAL 9000.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
description: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: The Apartment
description: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts.

title: Some Like It Hot
description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women.

title: All About Eve
description: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle.

title: The Maltese Falcon
description: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals.

title: Unforgiven
description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one more job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan.

title: Jaws
description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff to hunt the beast down.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish-American mobster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later.

title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
description: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

title: Vertigo
description: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a woman.

title: The Searchers
description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a relentless journey to find his abducted niece.

title: Stalker
description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

title: Ikiru
description: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning for his life after discovering he has stomach cancer.

title: High Noon
description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone.

title: The Wild Bunch
description: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the traditional American West is disappearing around them.

title: Notorious
description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors.

title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
description: A distant poor relative of the Duke of D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs.

title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
description: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

title: The Night of the Hunter
description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10000.

title: Touch of Evil
description: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: The Big Sleep
description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

title: Sullivan's Travels
description: A Hollywood director, John L. Sullivan, sets out to experience life as a poor, homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience.

title: Yojimbo

description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

title: Nashville
description: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political rally.

title: Manhattan
description: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

title: Annie Hall
description: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

title: The Conversation
description: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

title: The French Connection
description: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring from France.

title: Network
description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

title: All the President's Men

title: Dog Day Afternoon
description: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

title: The Exorcist
description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

title: Klute
description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

title: The Last Picture Show
description: In a small Texas town, a group of young people struggle with the transition from adolescence to adulthood.

title: Carnal Knowledge
description: The concurrent sexual lives of best friends Jonathan and Sandy are presented, those lives which are affected by the sexual mores of the time.

title: Nashville
description: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political rally.
